# gzeon

warden

Available for Hire

dev [@offchainlabs](https://twitter.com/offchainlabs), initial builders of

[@code4rena](https://twitter.com/code4rena)

## Highlights

  * Ranked #18 on Code4rena all-time leaderboard

As of June 2023, I'm currently ranked #18 on Code4rena's all-time leaderboard,
with $160k+ in awards.

## gzeon's Activity

The Activity Stream is currently in beta. [Share feedback here](/help).

## Available for hire

[Get a quote](https://code4rena.typeform.com/solo-
audit#warden=gzeon&source=gzeon-profile)
